sub_title_forgot_pass: Please enter your email to reset your password.
push_notification_permission_required: You haven't allow push notification permission. Please go to the "Settings" and enable push notification.
msg_register_success: We sent an email to your email. Please confirm your email.
message_forgot_password: You will shortly receive an email with a link to a web page where you will be able to set up a new password for your account.
message_scan_face_id: Scan your fingerprint on the device scanner to continue.
seach_recipients_place_holder: Enter id, name, email, wallet address ...
transfer_amount_title: ENTER THE AMOUNT YOU WANT TO TRANSFER
deposit_agent_message: To deposit money, please contact one of ACWallet's resellers below
vndt_note_1: • Deposit will be used after #LIMIT confirmations from blockchain network.
vndt_note_2: • After depositing, you can track the transaction details at the transaction history page.
vndt_note_3: • To activate and use #NAME wallet , you must first deposit at least 20 XRP into your Ripple address. The #LIMIT #NAME minimum cannot be moved out.
vndt_note_4: • Transactions for USDT-ERC20 must use ETH as a transaction fee.
note_1: • Coins will be deposited immediately after #LIMIT block confirmations
note_2: • To activate and use #COIN_ID wallet , you must first deposit at least #LIMIT #COIN_ID into your #COIN_NAME address. The #LIMIT #COIN_ID minimum cannot be moved out.
confirm_logout_message: Are you sure you want to logout now?
google_authen_message: Google Authenticator protects your Acwallet account from keyloggers and password theft. With two-factor authentication, you'll need both your password and an authentication code to log in.
email_authen_message: The email address you use to receive the login code, receive notifications when there is a change in account balance and when the transaction is completed.
auth_google_step_1_msg: Install 'Google Authenticator' application on your internet-connected devices such as: Android phone, Iphone, Ipad, Laptop, Desktop ...
auth_google_step_2_msg: Use Google Authenticator to scan QR Code image below to get 6 authentication numbers (or click on browser on mobile device)
auth_google_step_3_msg: Enter the 6-digit authentication code provided by the Google Authenticator app and go to the 'Authentication code' box below.
auth_google_step_4_msg: Record carefully or print a 16 digit copy of the blue 'Security Code' below and keep it in a safe place.
auth_google_step_5_msg: If your phone is lost, stolen or deleted, you will need this code to restore the Google Authenticator app.
auth_google_step_6_msg: Don't share it with anyone. Be wary! We will never ask you for this security code.
enter_2_step_verification: Enter the 2-step verification code provided by your authentication app
google_authen_enable_msg: You have been actived google authentication.
none_use_authen_via_email_msg: If you want to enable Email Authentication, please disable GOOGLE authentication.
verify_code_in_your_phone_msg: Enter the 2-step verification code provided in your Phone inbox
verify_code_in_your_email_msg: Enter the 2-step verification code provided in your Email inbox
none_use_authen_goole_msg: If you want to enable Google Authenticator, please disable
email_authen_enable: You have been actived Email Authentication.
create_giftcode_title: Select the currency to create giftcode
note_giftcode_private: * Recipients must authenticate with Pin Code
note_giftcode_authen_sender: * Recipients must authenticate with the creator's Uid
note_giftcode_recipients: * Only the specified recipient receives the giftcode
receive_giftcode_success_msg: Congratulations! You have received giftcode successfully
giftcode_require_creator: Giftcode requires authentication of creator information. Please enter creator's UId
alert: Do you want to delete now ?
touchid: Please sign in to enable Touch ID/Face ID
message_invite_friend: The recipient will soon receive the registration link via Email
note_remember: The note will help you remember this withdrawal purpose
sell_coin: If you want to sell #COIN_NAME into VND, please contact one of the agents of ACWallet by clicking on the link below.
note_desposit: To purchase #NAME please contact one of ACWallet's resellers by clicking on the link below.
warning: Your number of #COIN_NAME is not enough to make a minimum transaction of #LIMIT #COIN_NAME. Please deposit more #COIN_NAME
tex1: We need to verify your identity with a portrait photo and government-issued identification: Passport or Identity card and Driving license.
text2: Currently, Acwallet only supports account authentication for customers coming from Việt Nam.
upload_passport: 2.  Upload photo of your identity card or passport
choose_passport: Choose a photo ID or a Passport page with your face photo
choose_driver_license: Choose your front driver's license photo
Upload_a_portrait_photo_with_your_ID_car: 4.  Upload a portrait photo with your ID card or passport
Upload_your_portrait_with_your_ID_card_o: Upload your portrait with your ID card or passport in hand
text3: You have uploaded the images we requested. Last step you just need to click on the button Send request to send verification record.
waiting_verify: Your request to verify your account has been received. Thank you!
verify: Your Account Is Being Verified. Now you can still make transactions on AC Wallet !
verified: Your Account Verified. Now you can still make transactions on AC Wallet !
warning_transfer: Note! Money can only be send to recipients within the AC Wallet system.
new_pass_invalid: Password must have at least 6 characters and no more than 50 characters !
invalid_money: The amount in your #NAME wallet is not enough to make the transaction. Please deposit more #NAME !
invalid_money_transfer: The amount exceeds the #NAME amount in your wallet !
check_address: This is your #COIN address. Please enter another address !
check_wallet_trx: Your TRX wallet does not have enough balance to transfer #COIN.
change_avtar_success: Change avatar successfully. Please reset the app !
invalid_money_sell: Your number of #NAME is not enough to make a minimum transaction of #LIMIT #NAME. Please deposit more #NAME.
invalid_money_buy: The amount in your VNDT wallet is not enough to make a minimum transaction of #LIMIT #NAME. Please deposit more VNDT.
validate_address: Your #NAME address is incorrect. Please check again.
auto_send_loan: The loan will be automatically transferred to the borrower in a few minutes !
await_loan: Please wait until your loan is approved!
auto_repaid_loan: The refund will be automatically sent to the creditor in a few minutes.
invalid_nationalID_length: Minimum ID cart length is 9 digits
you_just_received: You have just received an invitation to join the company #NAME
refuse_success: You have successfully rejected the word !
delete_personal: Are you sure to remove #NAME from #COMPANY ?
enter_sheetname_sheetid: Step 1: Enter Sheet Id and Sheet Name. Please share read permission with email:
make_sure_the_content_is_the_same_as_thi: Note: Make sure the content is the same as this template
step1_import_file: Step 1: Upload the list file. Pay attention to the data format in File
note1_file_excel: Note 1. Only applicable to EXCEL file
note2_file_excel: Note 2. Please use an EXCEL file with the following format (Click the image to download the form)
intruct_get_sheet: 2. Instructions to get Sheet ID and Sheet Name
step1_share_sheets: Step 1: At the Sheets file you want to share, click Share in the upper right corner.
step2_share_sheets: Step 2: Enter acwallet@appspot.gserviceaccount.com, check to turn off NOTIFICATIONS FOR THIS PEOPLE, then press share.

privacy_screen.privacy_text_1: You must read and accept our privacy terms to continue.
